title: Scary as sh*t
review: Most people on here are saying that it is not scary and badly done, but I watched it last night (Halloween) and became so scared after 45 mins. that I was physically ill. I've never been more scared in my life. What i did see was good, though. I'll never watch it again.

title: if it wasn't for the soundtrack...
review: If it wasn't for the awsome songs in this movie I wouldn't have been able to get through it. one of the all time worst! i can't beleive how bad it was. i just wanted to rip my arm off so i would have something to throw at the movie screen. was not worth the money to see it!
